thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Nielsen Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.52

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Nielsen Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.52
text:
(Updates to add Q4 I/B/E/S GAAP EPS estimate of $0.46, which is comparable to GAAP EPS of $0.23 reported by Nielsen Holdings; removes reference to non-GAAP earnings estimate)
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Nielsen Holdings Plc:
* NIELSEN REPORTS 4TH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.23 * Q4 REVENUE $1.761 BILLION * SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.40 TO $1.46 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.46 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $1.76 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * ‍COMPANY IS MAINTAINING ITS FULL YEAR GUIDANCE​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.52 EXCLUDING ITEMS * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.63, REVENUE VIEW $6.78 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
